{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Field Marketer Job at Pinpoint Academy",
  "description": "Pinpoint Academy -&nbsp;Training Academy for Microsoft Excel, Basic, Advance , Power BI and Data Analysis. Training for students and Workers, with over 100 students leaning remotely.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Field Marketer

Job Location:&nbsp;Nigeria
Employment Type:&nbsp;Full-time (Hybrid: remote and field)

Job Summary


	We&#39;re seeking a highly motivated and experienced Marketer to drive sales and brand growth for our company.
	As a Marketer, you&#39;ll develop and implement effective sales and marketing strategies to reach potential clients, generate leads, and convert them into loyal clients.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute integrated marketing campaigns to promote our services.
	Analyze market trends and consumer behavior to inform marketing decisions.
	Manage relationships with our potential.
	Negotiate product placement and promotional deals with clients.
	Monitor and analyze competitor activities and market dynamics.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications.
	Proven experience in sales and marketing.
	Strong presentation skills.
	Excellent communication, relationship-building, and negotiation skills.
	Self-motivated, target-driven, and comfortable working independently in the field.


What We Offer


	Basic allowances.
	Commission and bonuses.
	Opportunities for professional growth and development in a fast-growing company.
	Collaborative and dynamic work environment.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume / CV to:&nbsp;pinpointpartners2025@outlook.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2025-08-10",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Pinpoint Global Consult"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
      "addressLocality": "Abuja, Enugu, Lagos, Rivers (PH)",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
    }
  },

    "@type": "PropertyValue",

    "value": "184169"
  },

    "currency": "NGN",
    "value": {
      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 0,
      "maxValue": 0,

    }

}



Field Marketer Job at Pinpoint Academy




        
    

        
        Pinpoint Academy - Training Academy for Microsoft Excel, Basic, Advance , Power BI and Data Analysis. Training for students and Workers, with over 100 students leaning remotely.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Field Marketer

Job Location: Nigeria
Employment Type: Full-time (Hybrid: remote and field)

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We're seeking a highly motivated and experienced Marketer to drive sales and brand growth for our company.
	As a Marketer, you'll develop and implement effective sales and marketing strategies to reach potential clients, generate leads, and convert them into loyal clients.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute integrated marketing campaigns to promote our services.
	Analyze market trends and consumer behavior to inform marketing decisions.
	Manage relationships with our potential.
	Negotiate product placement and promotional deals with clients.
	Monitor and analyze competitor activities and market dynamics.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications.
	Proven experience in sales and marketing.
	Strong presentation skills.
	Excellent communication, relationship-building, and negotiation skills.
	Self-motivated, target-driven, and comfortable working independently in the field.


What We Offer


	Basic allowances.
	Commission and bonuses.
	Opportunities for professional growth and development in a fast-growing company.
	Collaborative and dynamic work environment.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume / CV to: pinpointpartners2025@outlook.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Project Manager – Construction Industry Job at PoweredUp Consulting",
  "description": "PoweredUp Consulting is a fully indigenous organization that focuses on organizational enrichments through Human Resources and Coaching.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Project Manager &ndash; Construction Industry

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Reporting To: The CTO &amp; MD

Job Summary


	We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Project Manager to oversee and manage construction projects from inception to completion.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for coordinating all aspects of construction activities, including budgeting, scheduling, procurement, quality assurance, and stakeholder communication, ensuring projects are delivered on time, within scope, and within budget.


Key Responsibilities


	Lead the planning and implementation of construction projects.
	Manage project scope, objectives, timelines, resources, and budgets.
	Coordinate internal resources and third parties/vendors for flawless execution.
	Ensure resource availability and allocation in accordance with project plans.
	Develop detailed project plans to track progress and manage changes in scope, schedule, and costs.
	Prepare and manage project documentation, reports, and deliverables.
	Enforce compliance with all relevant health, safety, and environmental regulations.
	Conduct risk management to minimize project risks.
	Establish strong working relationships with clients, consultants, contractors, and regulatory bodies.
	Supervise site engineers, contractors, and subcontractors.
	Monitor project progress and provide regular updates to senior management.
	Resolve conflicts, delays, or issues that may arise during construction.
	Ensure high standards of workmanship and materials in line with specifications.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Architecture, Quantity Surveying, Civil Engineering, Building Technology, Construction Management, or related field.
	Minimum of 5 years of proven experience as a Project Manager in the construction industry.
	Strong understanding of construction methods, materials, and legal regulations.
	Excellent project management skills including budgeting, scheduling, and resource allocation.
	Proficiency in project management tools (e.g., MS Project, AutoCAD, Primavera) is an advantage.
	Exceptional leadership, communication, and organizational skills.
	Ability to work under pressure and manage multiple priorities and projects.
	Certification in Project Management (e.g., PMP, PRINCE2).
	Knowledge of safety and quality control standards.
	Must be willing to travel to project sites and work extended ours when required.


Salary &amp; Benefits


	Competitive salary based on experience
	Health insurance and other statutory benefits
	Performance-based bonuses
	Opportunity for career advancement and training


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;recruitment@poweredupcon.com&nbsp;using &quot;Project Manager &ndash; Construction Industry&quot;&nbsp;as the subject of the mail.",
  "datePosted": "2025-07-11",
  "validThrough": "2025-08-10",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "PoweredUp Consulting"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",

Project Manager – Construction Industry Job at PoweredUp Consulting




        
    

        
        PoweredUp Consulting is a fully indigenous organization that focuses on organizational enrichments through Human Resources and Coaching.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Project Manager – Construction Industry

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Reporting To: The CTO & MD

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Project Manager to oversee and manage construction projects from inception to completion.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for coordinating all aspects of construction activities, including budgeting, scheduling, procurement, quality assurance, and stakeholder communication, ensuring projects are delivered on time, within scope, and within budget.


Key Responsibilities


	Lead the planning and implementation of construction projects.
	Manage project scope, objectives, timelines, resources, and budgets.
	Coordinate internal resources and third parties/vendors for flawless execution.
	Ensure resource availability and allocation in accordance with project plans.
	Develop detailed project plans to track progress and manage changes in scope, schedule, and costs.
	Prepare and manage project documentation, reports, and deliverables.
	Enforce compliance with all relevant health, safety, and environmental regulations.
	Conduct risk management to minimize project risks.
	Establish strong working relationships with clients, consultants, contractors, and regulatory bodies.
	Supervise site engineers, contractors, and subcontractors.
	Monitor project progress and provide regular updates to senior management.
	Resolve conflicts, delays, or issues that may arise during construction.
	Ensure high standards of workmanship and materials in line with specifications.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Architecture, Quantity Surveying, Civil Engineering, Building Technology, Construction Management, or related field.
	Minimum of 5 years of proven experience as a Project Manager in the construction industry.
	Strong understanding of construction methods, materials, and legal regulations.
	Excellent project management skills including budgeting, scheduling, and resource allocation.
	Proficiency in project management tools (e.g., MS Project, AutoCAD, Primavera) is an advantage.
	Exceptional leadership, communication, and organizational skills.
	Ability to work under pressure and manage multiple priorities and projects.
	Certification in Project Management (e.g., PMP, PRINCE2).
	Knowledge of safety and quality control standards.
	Must be willing to travel to project sites and work extended ours when required.


Salary & Benefits


	Competitive salary based on experience
	Health insurance and other statutory benefits
	Performance-based bonuses
	Opportunity for career advancement and training


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@poweredupcon.com using "Project Manager – Construction Industry" as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Accounts Assistant Job at Hatlab Ice Cream Delite Limited",
  "description": "Hatlab Ice Cream Delite is a hospitality organization that specializes in the production, wholesale and retail of traditional Italian gelato and other complimentary pastries.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accounts Assistant

Job Location:&nbsp;Wuse Zone 5, Abuja (FCT)&nbsp;
Employment Type: NYSC

Job Description
The accountant assistant will be responsible for but not limited to:


	Assist with daily cash collections and reconciliation, with account fillings
	Reconciliation of company records to match bank statements
	Identification of discrepancies in financial statements, with filing of NSITF and PAYE, with inventory audit and monitor reorder levels
	Provide support in the preparation of financial reports, such as income statements, balance sheets and cash flow statements.
	Assist in the analysis of financial data and presentation of financial performance to management.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an OND / HND / Bachelor`s Degree with 0 - 1 year of work experience.
	Best fit: Corp members and persons with account background.


Salary
N40,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;careerswithkadri@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Accounts Assistant Job at Hatlab Ice Cream Delite Limited




        
    

        
        Hatlab Ice Cream Delite is a hospitality organization that specializes in the production, wholesale and retail of traditional Italian gelato and other complimentary pastries.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accounts Assistant

Job Location: Wuse Zone 5, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: NYSC

Job Description
The accountant assistant will be responsible for but not limited to:
     

            
    




	Assist with daily cash collections and reconciliation, with account fillings
	Reconciliation of company records to match bank statements
	Identification of discrepancies in financial statements, with filing of NSITF and PAYE, with inventory audit and monitor reorder levels
	Provide support in the preparation of financial reports, such as income statements, balance sheets and cash flow statements.
	Assist in the analysis of financial data and presentation of financial performance to management.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an OND / HND / Bachelor`s Degree with 0 - 1 year of work experience.
	Best fit: Corp members and persons with account background.


Salary
N40,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careerswithkadri@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: This is a full time role and the person will be available on Monday - Friday except on CDS days.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Digital Marketing Specialist Job at Whoosh Logistics",
  "description": "Whoosh NG is an thriving logistics business with one of the best operations processes, structure and outlook in the SME category in Lagos State. Having been in business for three years, Whoosh NG has fulfilled more than 20,000 deliveries locally and globally. However, Whoosh NG is evolving from the conventional business space to become a Logistics Technology Company

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketing Specialist
Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled Digital Marketing Specialist to plan, execute, and optimize our online marketing efforts.
	The ideal candidate will be well-versed in digital marketing concepts, tools, and best practices, and know how to develop integrated digital campaigns that drive engagement, traffic, and conversions across multiple platforms.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and implement comprehensive digital marketing strategies to support brand and sales objectives.
	Conduct market research, competitor analysis, and audience profiling to inform campaign planning.
	Manage and optimize SEO/SEM efforts to boost website traffic and search rankings.
	Create and manage content strategies across web, social media, blogs, and email platforms.
	Plan, execute, and monitor paid advertising campaigns (Google Ads, Facebook, LinkedIn, etc.).
	Manage company social media channels; create engaging content, monitor trends, and respond to engagement.
	Design and run targeted email marketing campaigns to nurture leads and retain customers.
	Track campaign performance metrics and generate actionable reports using tools such as Google Analytics, Meta Business Suite, and others.
	Optimize user journey and conversion rates through A/B testing and CRO techniques.
	Stay current with digital marketing trends, tools, and best practices; apply innovative solutions.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Marketing, Communications, Digital Media, or related field.
	2&ndash;4 years of proven experience in digital marketing or a related role.
	Strong understanding of current digital marketing tools, platforms, and strategies.
	Hands-on experience with SEO, Google Ads, Meta Ads, email platforms, and content management systems (e.g., WordPress).
	Proficiency in analytics tools (Google Analytics, Hotjar, etc.).
	Creative thinking and excellent communication skills.
	Strong attention to detail and ability to manage multiple campaigns simultaneously.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;careers@whoosh.com.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

  "validThrough": "2025-08-10",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Whoosh Logistics"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
      "addressLocality": "Lagos",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "184166"
  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",

      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 0,
      "maxValue": 0,
      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }

}



Digital Marketing Specialist Job at Whoosh Logistics




        
    

        
        Whoosh NG is an thriving logistics business with one of the best operations processes, structure and outlook in the SME category in Lagos State. Having been in business for three years, Whoosh NG has fulfilled more than 20,000 deliveries locally and globally. However, Whoosh NG is evolving from the conventional business space to become a Logistics Technology Company

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketing Specialist
Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled Digital Marketing Specialist to plan, execute, and optimize our online marketing efforts.
	The ideal candidate will be well-versed in digital marketing concepts, tools, and best practices, and know how to develop integrated digital campaigns that drive engagement, traffic, and conversions across multiple platforms.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and implement comprehensive digital marketing strategies to support brand and sales objectives.
	Conduct market research, competitor analysis, and audience profiling to inform campaign planning.
	Manage and optimize SEO/SEM efforts to boost website traffic and search rankings.
	Create and manage content strategies across web, social media, blogs, and email platforms.
	Plan, execute, and monitor paid advertising campaigns (Google Ads, Facebook, LinkedIn, etc.).
	Manage company social media channels; create engaging content, monitor trends, and respond to engagement.
	Design and run targeted email marketing campaigns to nurture leads and retain customers.
	Track campaign performance metrics and generate actionable reports using tools such as Google Analytics, Meta Business Suite, and others.
	Optimize user journey and conversion rates through A/B testing and CRO techniques.
	Stay current with digital marketing trends, tools, and best practices; apply innovative solutions.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, Digital Media, or related field.
	2–4 years of proven experience in digital marketing or a related role.
	Strong understanding of current digital marketing tools, platforms, and strategies.
	Hands-on experience with SEO, Google Ads, Meta Ads, email platforms, and content management systems (e.g., WordPress).
	Proficiency in analytics tools (Google Analytics, Hotjar, etc.).
	Creative thinking and excellent communication skills.
	Strong attention to detail and ability to manage multiple campaigns simultaneously.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@whoosh.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Outlet Supervisor Job at Hatlab Ice Cream Delite Limited",
  "description": "Hatlab Ice Cream Delite is a hospitality organization that specializes in the production, wholesale and retail of traditional Italian gelato and other complimentary pastries.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Outlet Supervisor
Job Location:&nbsp;Wuse Zone 5, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
Operational Leadership:


	Manage day-to-day operations of the outlet (production &amp; shop floor).
	Ensure the cleanliness and organization of the shop floor.
	Implement and enforce standard operating procedures (SOPs).
	Monitor and maintain inventory levels, including ordering and restocking.
	Oversee the preparation and baking of a variety of pastries, desserts, breads, and gelato.
	Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of daily financial transactions.
	Reconcile cash registers and prepare daily financial reports.
	Reconcile daily cash transactions with financial records.
	Investigate and resolve discrepancies in a timely manner.
	Ensure consistency in quality, taste, and presentation of all products.
	Ensure the secure and organized handling of cash and other payment methods.
	Generate customer invoices and receipts for takeout and delivery orders.
	Verify the accuracy of billing information and resolve any discrepancies.
	Assist in preparing financial reports and statements as required.
	Collaborate with the finance team and management to ensure accurate financial documentation.
	Ensure compliance with financial policies, procedures, and regulations.
	Participate in internal and external audits as needed.


Customer Service:


	Foster a customer-centric environment.
	Train and lead staff in providing outstanding customer service.
	Address customer inquiries, feedback, and concerns promptly.
	Uphold brand standards for quality and service.


Team Management:


	Train, and develop a high-performing team.
	Schedule staff shifts effectively to meet operational needs.
	Conduct performance reviews and provide constructive feedback.
	Foster a positive and collaborative work environment.


Sales and Marketing:


	Implement sales strategies to achieve revenue targets.
	Collaborate with the marketing team to execute promotional activities.
	Monitor sales trends and identify opportunities for growth.


Recipe Development &amp; production Planning


	Stay informed about industry trends and introduce innovative and seasonal product offerings.
	Create and modify recipes to meet the company&#39;s standards and customer preferences.
	Conduct research to stay current with product trends and techniques.


Ordering and Inventory Management.


	Source and select high-quality ingredients for production.
	Manage inventory of production raw materials and supplies.
	Place orders for ingredients and supplies as needed from HQ.
	Manage inventory levels to prevent shortages or overstocking.


Quality Control:


	Implement quality control measures to ensure that all products meet established standards.
	Conduct regular tastings and evaluations.
	Ensure that all products are well presented in an aesthetically pleasing manner.


Hygiene and Safety:


	Adhere to food safety and hygiene standards.
	Monitor and enforce cleanliness and sanitation in the pastry kitchen.


Qualifications


	Candidates should possess an HND / Bachelor&#39;s Degree 2-4 years of experience.


Benefits


	Salary:&nbsp;N80,000 - N100,000 / Month
	13th Month
	Leave Allowance
	Holiday bonus.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;careerswithkadri@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",
  "datePosted": "2025-07-11",
  "validThrough": "2025-08-10",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Hatlab Ice Cream Delite Limited"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {

Outlet Supervisor Job at Hatlab Ice Cream Delite Limited




        
    

        
        Hatlab Ice Cream Delite is a hospitality organization that specializes in the production, wholesale and retail of traditional Italian gelato and other complimentary pastries.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Outlet Supervisor
Job Location: Wuse Zone 5, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
Operational Leadership:
     

            
    




	Manage day-to-day operations of the outlet (production & shop floor).
	Ensure the cleanliness and organization of the shop floor.
	Implement and enforce standard operating procedures (SOPs).
	Monitor and maintain inventory levels, including ordering and restocking.
	Oversee the preparation and baking of a variety of pastries, desserts, breads, and gelato.
	Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of daily financial transactions.
	Reconcile cash registers and prepare daily financial reports.
	Reconcile daily cash transactions with financial records.
	Investigate and resolve discrepancies in a timely manner.
	Ensure consistency in quality, taste, and presentation of all products.
	Ensure the secure and organized handling of cash and other payment methods.
	Generate customer invoices and receipts for takeout and delivery orders.
	Verify the accuracy of billing information and resolve any discrepancies.
	Assist in preparing financial reports and statements as required.
	Collaborate with the finance team and management to ensure accurate financial documentation.
	Ensure compliance with financial policies, procedures, and regulations.
	Participate in internal and external audits as needed.


Customer Service:


	Foster a customer-centric environment.
	Train and lead staff in providing outstanding customer service.
	Address customer inquiries, feedback, and concerns promptly.
	Uphold brand standards for quality and service.


Team Management:


	Train, and develop a high-performing team.
	Schedule staff shifts effectively to meet operational needs.
	Conduct performance reviews and provide constructive feedback.
	Foster a positive and collaborative work environment.


Sales and Marketing:


	Implement sales strategies to achieve revenue targets.
	Collaborate with the marketing team to execute promotional activities.
	Monitor sales trends and identify opportunities for growth.


Recipe Development & production Planning


	Stay informed about industry trends and introduce innovative and seasonal product offerings.
	Create and modify recipes to meet the company's standards and customer preferences.
	Conduct research to stay current with product trends and techniques.


Ordering and Inventory Management.


	Source and select high-quality ingredients for production.
	Manage inventory of production raw materials and supplies.
	Place orders for ingredients and supplies as needed from HQ.
	Manage inventory levels to prevent shortages or overstocking.


Quality Control:


	Implement quality control measures to ensure that all products meet established standards.
	Conduct regular tastings and evaluations.
	Ensure that all products are well presented in an aesthetically pleasing manner.


Hygiene and Safety:


	Adhere to food safety and hygiene standards.
	Monitor and enforce cleanliness and sanitation in the pastry kitchen.


Qualifications


	Candidates should possess an HND / Bachelor's Degree 2-4 years of experience.


Benefits


	Salary: N80,000 - N100,000 / Month
	13th Month
	Leave Allowance
	Holiday bonus.
